summary: REQ-2 appears implemented by updating the 2nd entry in `PREVIEW_IMAGES` on `LoginPage.tsx` to `/assets/cal.png` while keeping 4 images. REQ-1 is not implemented because no new static asset file was added under `frontend/public/assets/`. Additional unrequested modifications were made to `frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file `cal.png` as a static frontend asset under `frontend/public/assets/` so it can be referenced at runtime without any resizing/cropping/styling changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so `frontend/public/assets/cal.png` was not created and therefore cannot be served at `/assets/cal.png`.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0 (no added files)
MODIFIED FILES list does not include `frontend/public/assets/cal.png`

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/generated `frontend-file-summaries.txt` content describing many unrelated components/features.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add `cal.png` under `frontend/public/assets/` and swap the 2nd image reference in `LoginPage.tsx`; it did not request updating repo summary documentation.
BuildRequest did not request changing project tracking/state files; only the asset addition and `LoginPage.tsx` image swap were requested.
